title: Spaghetti Carbonara
summary: A classic Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, bacon, and black pepper.
instructions: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package instructions.
While pasta is cooking, fry pancetta in a large pan until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated cheeses, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the pan with pancetta, remove from heat.
Quickly stir in the egg and cheese mixture, adding pasta water as needed to create a creamy sauce.
Serve immediately with extra grated cheese and black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
summary: Chunks of grilled chicken (tikka) cooked in a smooth buttery & creamy tomato based gravy.
instructions: Marinate chicken in yogurt, lemon juice, and half of the spices for at least 2 hours.
Grill or pan-fry the marinated chicken until cooked through.
In a large pan, heat oil and saut√© onions until golden brown.
Add garlic and ginger, cook for another minute.
Add remaining spices and cook until fragrant.
Add canned tomatoes and simmer for 10 minutes.
Blend the sauce until smooth, then return to the pan.
Add grilled chicken and cream, simmer for 5-10 minutes.
Garnish with cilantro and serve with naan bread or rice.
